usaa-domain.description: Monitoring for scan tasks that have 'usaa' in the domain
usaa-domain.notes: This query captures domains containing 'usaa', which may indicate attempts to impersonate the financial institution

usaa-title.description: Monitoring for scan tasks that have 'Member Account Login | USAA' in the page title
usaa-title.notes: This query finds pages with the exact USAA login page title, which is a common phishing tactic

usaa-favicon.description: Monitoring for scan tasks that use the official USAA favicon hash
usaa-favicon.notes: This query detects sites using the USAA favicon hash, which is often an indicator of phishing attempts

chase-domain.description: Monitoring for scan tasks that have 'chase' in the domain
chase-domain.notes: This query identifies domains with 'chase' in the name, which may indicate attempts to impersonate Chase Bank
